input_data.prompt_to_llm:
The following financial transaction passed all fraud checks and no unusual patterns were detected. Please generate a concise (2-3 sentences) and reassuring narrative explaining this. Do not include a conversational opening or closing. Focus on clarity and professionalism.

Transaction details: ID 326c38b3-5c8f-43ed-a570-bfd5a363bd75, Amount $150.00, Card Type credit, User Location USA, Merchant Amazon, Merchant Location USA.

description: The transaction ID 326c38b3-5c8f-43ed-a570-bfd5a363bd75 has been cleared of any fraudulent activity. The payment of $150.00 to Amazon from a credit card, originating from the USA, matches expected patterns and does not exhibit any unusual characteristics. This transaction is deemed legitimate and has been approved for processing.
